sentences.en: ...a small port on the north-western extremity of the Iberian peninsula.

sentences.en: Amputation is indicated for those with extremities cancer and systemic amyloid degeneration.

sentences.en: Exercise is very important as it keeps the circulation moving and warms the extremities.

sentences.en: He found that his extremities grew cold.

sentences.en: I can't feel any of my extremities and I mean any of them.

sentences.en: In the past, the region had been protected by its forbidding geography and the extremities of its climate.
sentences.cn: 过去，这个地区令人生畏的地理条件和极端的天气状况使它受到保护。

sentences.en: Most cramps occur in the extremities especially with the legs.

sentences.en: Motor power and sensation in the lower extremities are normal.

sentences.en: On the present occasion, he was reluctant to proceed extremities , although the provocation was so great.

sentences.cn: 我觉得她那副穷极可怜的样子实在太惹人注目.

sentences.cn: 西北边区的冬天也可能会相当凉.

words.tran_cn: 四肢，骨端；末端，极限（extremity复数形式）；手足

phrases.tran_cn: 极大的危险(或不幸消息)

trans.tran_cn: 端点( extremity的名词复数 )，尽头，手和足，极窘迫的境地
trans.tran_en: The extremity of something is its farthest end or edge
